participant_abstract.sent: The meeting was useful as far as the evaluation of the remote control was concerned.
The budgeting was essential, but would have been more useful if we had been given information about the prices in advance.
The feedback part was not really useful as most of it was obvious.

participant_decisions.sent: We needed to cut down on the scroll + push button and on the speakers to fit it in the cost.

participant_problems.sent: Since the prices were not known in advance, we had to decide at the end on what items we could dispose off.
